title: Silver 1 looking for a top or jungle main to duo with

replies.body: That community's owners are terrible ^^^^ I was in it, and they were just backstabbing and unethical

> [{quoted}](name=freya od,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=zEbdO1kK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-25T12:58:02.018+0000)
>
> That community's owners are terrible ^^^^ I was in it, and they were just backstabbing and unethical

Seems like youre the guy who left because " you guys stole my idea of giving people ranks based on their league of legends rank" and when told EVERY community does this you left the group claiming one of their members who isnt even an admin stole the idea from you lol.  - Signed , a guy who's been in that discord for about 3 days lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Glo Stix,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=zEbdO1kK,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-25T13:02:44.999+0000)
>
> Seems like youre the guy who left because " you guys stole my idea of giving people ranks based on their league of legends rank" and when told EVERY community does this you left the group claiming one of their members who isnt even an admin stole the idea from you lol.  - Signed , a guy who's been in that discord for about 3 days lol.

It's not a coincidence, the owner of that one came to my channel under a different name (which it said aka ward trinket, but he didn't realize it did), sat on it, didn't respond to my messages, left, and then suddenly his server looked exactly like mine when it didn't before. He proceeded to laugh in my face about it later, and be a general jerk.

> [{quoted}](name=freya od,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=zEbdO1kK,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-25T14:51:37.127+0000)
>

He proceeded to laugh in my face about it later, and be a general jerk.

what is the link to your discord?

I'm by no means am telling you to join this community https://discord.gg/0rpwpPhRQTX3cche simply stating a place where you can go to look for others to play with If you do end up joining, that's cool

The link will take you to the Lobby room If you need more help message @narter4 or @monkeydood or any of the admins/owners/really anyone with a colored name I'm Magical Player in there This is a 100% copy pasted message

If possible please name set your discord name to your ign(helps alot)
End of text
